guide.introduction: The Mouse Glove is a glove that has the circuit board and parts of a wireless computer mouse inside. This will allow you to move your hand along any surface and use it as a mouse. The Mouse Glove also has fully functioning left and right buttons that are attached to your first two fingers. It is a very simple project that costs anywhere between $10 and $25 depending on how expensive your mouse is. It is portable, lightweight, and very convenient if you travel. It is also a great project if you'r just starting to learn how to mod household electronics.
